alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 9:38AM CDT until August 05 at 3:12AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Fish River Near Silverhill affecting Baldwin County. For the Fish River...including Silverhill...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...The Flood Warning is now in effect until late tonight... The Flood Warning continues for the Fish River Near Silverhill. * Until late tonight. * At 8:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.1 feet. * Flood stage is 11.0 feet. * Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.4 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. * Impact...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage, County Road 48 floods at Bohemian Park. At 13.0 feet, Houses on River Road begin to flood.At 13.7 feet, Water on lower floor of houses on River Road Extension. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
